attributes.action: ban the sales of all cosmetics tested on animals (even if tested on animals in another country)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ban the sales of all cosmetics tested on animals (even if tested on animals in another country)If this cannot be achieved, to ensure all cosmetics are labelled clearly (front of the packaging) with a recognisable and graphic logo so that the consumer immediately knows what they are buying.
